alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 6:54PM CDT until August 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR JACKSON...CENTRAL KIOWA AND NORTHWESTERN TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 654 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warren to near Friendship to near Humphreys to 3 miles southwest of Olustee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Altus, Blair, Olustee, Mountain Park, Roosevelt, Martha, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Tom Steed Reservoir, Warren, and Humphreys. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
